ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Ok to Print field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Ok_to_Print__c), ( PRIORVALUE(Ok_to_Print__c) = True ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'Ok to Print' field.
